description: This file contains utility functions and classes related to Git operations, including retrieving the remote origin URL for a directory and tracking clone progress.

classes.name: GitCloneProgress
classes.description: A class extending git.RemoteProgress to provide logging during Git clone operations.

methods.name: get_remote_origin_for_dir
methods.description: Retrieves the remote origin URL for a given directory path if it is a Git repository.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Overrides the update method to log progress messages during Git clone operations.
